English.expander_instructions:
- Inseam: Stand legs together, place a book at the crotch, measure from book top to heel (cm).
- Torso: Stand against a wall, measure from C7 vertebra to top of pelvis (iliac crest) vertically (cm).

English.health_tip1: - If your hip or lower back is stiff, add +0.5 cm to recommended Stack to reduce stress.
English.health_tip2: - If limited neck mobility, reduce Reach by 10 mm or raise stem by 5 mm.
English.health_tip3: - If you have pain/injury history, consult a physical therapist before major adjustments.
